title: An insight in to microwave induced defects and its impact on nonlinear process in NiO nanostructures under femtosecond and continuous wave laser excitation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30011-30036
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06056C, Paper

Ramseena Thundiyil, P. Poornesh, K. Ozga, J. Jedryka
This work demonstrates the impact of microwave (MW) irradiation on third-order nonlinear optical (NLO) processes in chemically deposited NiO nanostructure films.
